page.title: 16OUR FAVOURITE SHOPS
page.content: Lee's favourite shop is:- "...Thatto Cycles. It is a B.M.X. shop and it has lots of things in it like bicycle frames and forks. They also sell handlebars, cables, blocks, number plates, wheel plates and helmets. When it is my birthday I always go there to buy something. When I go there I buy stickers e.g., Skyway. You can have your bike sprayed any colour there. Philip's favourite shop is:- "..'Wong's Chinese Take Away'.... they sell chips, fish, chicken, peas and curry. The food is put into cardboard trays so that we can eat it at home....It is called a take-away shop. Paul's favourite shop is Partco where they sell parts for motorcars, e.g., steering wheels, clutches,brakes, fan-belts and batteries.
